review.title: “Lots of fun with fellow employees but the potential for growth is very small.”
review.pros: Pros – 90% of the people you work with are great. Everyone likes to have a good time and will help you out when you need it. The job is very interesting when you are working on jobs for the Navy.
review.cons: Cons – Projects are not planned well and management is always changing there mind about the priority of jobs so you will stop and start the same job several times. The pay is not much and you could have to wait a while to get a raise.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Plan and communicate better is workers.
